area_comments: As per the sale deed and plan, the built-up area is 2,100 sft, with 1,050 sft on Ground Floor and 1,050 sft on First Floor. Land area is 134 sq. yds (1,206 sft).
occupancy_comments: Based on the property tax receipt and contact with the owner, the property is self-occupied by the buyer.
construction_comments: The property is fully constructed as per the sale deed and plan. The structure is RCC with brick walls and is in good condition.
market_value_definition: Market Value is defined as 'an opinion of the best price at which the sale of an interest in property would have been completed unconditionally for cash consideration on the date of the valuation, assuming (1) a willing seller; (2) that, prior to the date of valuation, there had been a reasonable period (having regard to the nature of the property and the state of the market) for the proper marketing of the interest and for the agreement of the sale price; (3) that, the state of the market, level of values and other circumstances were, on any earlier assumed date of exchange of contracts, the same as on the date of valuation; (4) that no account is taken of any additional bid by a prospective buyer with a special interest; (5) that both parties to the transaction had acted knowledgeably, prudently and without compulsion.'
documents_description: Valuation Initiation Form, Sale Deed, House Plan/Permission, Tax Receipt, Photos
valuer_comments:
• The subject property is a residential independent house located at Plot No. 177, Survey No. 277, Ameenpur, Sangareddy District, Telangana.
• As per the sale deed, the land area is 134 sq. yds (1,206 sft) and the built-up area is 2,100 sft (1,050 sft each on Ground and First Floor).
• The building is RCC with brick walls and appears in good condition.
• The valuation is based on document review and site inspection.
• No significant deviations in unit or vertical dimensions are noted from available documents.
• The property is self-occupied by the buyer as confirmed by municipal tax receipt and contact details.
• The property is not within 100m of any protected monument/area.
• Future physical life is expected to be 55 years as per standard assessment.
• It is assumed that the property has clear title and all necessary approvals.
valuer_declaration: I confirm that the market value for the subject property as on 27 June 2025 is INR NA/- [NA] and the value of amenities as on 27 June 2025 is INR NA/- [NA] taking into consideration the market dynamics and the condition of the property, its location, and amenities available.
disclaimer_text: Please note that the above is a valuation and not a structural survey. CBRE is not responsible to HSBC or the purchaser of the above property for any flaws and/or faults with the property not detected by the above Valuer.
